title: Composition
text: Remember that to solve g(f(x)), we need to plug in the value of f(x) into the value of $$x$$ in g(x).

title: Composition
text: We need to plug in f(x), or $$x^2+1$$, for the $$x$$ in the function f: $$\sqrt{x^2+1+2}$$.

title: Addition
text: We need to add the constants: $$\sqrt{x^2+2+1}=\sqrt{x^2+3}$$.
